overview: Founder and CEO of Bonvoy, a social travel startup that makes group travel a breeze. Mujteba is former social entrepreneur working with various non-profits on solving core constituent concerns. Drawing from that background, he turned his attention to eliminate the hassles in small group travel through the social web. Mujteba is generalist who does whatever is needed to succeed. He is a worldwide traveler who loves to learn about people and the cultures that embody them. Mujteba graduated from Baylor University with a degree in Neuroscience
